Author: graffitiedhearts
Text: thanks. i’m gonna try to talk to her later when she gets home from work and let her know she crossed a line i wasn’t ready to go over yet.

Author: eattillithurts
Text: i dont know about your relationship at all, so take this with a grain of salt, but i would suggest that you talk more with her now. tell her that what she did hurt you, and that you probably will not tell her more or ever again anything about your life if you cant trust her.  I know that a mother wants to help, but if she is not trusting you, even if you are underage, its not worth talking with her. I am 30 btw. Your mother should help you with your pace. she should have gotten help or get help if youre really at the edge of your ED, dying, purging whatever, but not like this.   i hope you get the help you need. Stay safe and good luck.
